explanation:
STEP1: "ab" occurs in "abba"
applying transition 0 ("ab"->"aabaa") gives "aabaaba"
STEP2: "ab" occurs in "aabaaba"
applying transition 0 ("ab"->"aabaa") gives "aaabaaaaba"
STEP3: "ab" occurs in "aaabaaaaba"
applying transition 0 ("ab"->"aabaa") gives "aaaabaaaaaaba"
STEP4: "aaaabaaaaaaba" occurs in "aaaabaaaaaaba"
applying final transition ("aaaabaaaaaaba"->"") gives ""
